Interview with Mandi Walls

Interviewee: Mandi Walls
Topic: developer community and conference conversations
Community: General
Description: Mandi Walls works for Opscode and is a frequent speaker on DevOps and the Chef tools. She also helps out with planning for the annual ChefConf conference.
